title: Expanding the Expression
text: The first step is to expand the expression. $$0^5=0\times0\times0\times0\times0$$.

title: Answer
text: Since the product of $$0\times0$$ is always 0, we can tell that $$0^5=0$$. This is because no matter how many times we multiply 0 by itself, it will always be 0.
